I've played CS since the early 2000s. 

This is CS when it is at it's absolute best. Some of the original charm is lost during the modernization but the game is still great and it is still CS. If you like twitch shooters there really isn't any alternative that I could recommend more than this.

Skilled base game, you have to train alot if you want to be high ranked. 

Alot of untrustfull accounts, but if you buy PRIME and spend on it few couples hours, than its good game.

Every second game is with/against cheaters, not that I'm bad or what ever, it's just easy to tell when player is using some sort of an advantage, they usually start with going around 2:10, 4:11, 3:12, after those scores, players tend to become a lot stronger opponents, knowing more than they did in first half and not only do their aim get better, but also predicting where you are going or moving in the map... I have a lot of hours in different accounts, have been global, and I can tell who is a good player, and who appears to be bad, but all of a sudden a real hero(cheating). This game is just not the game it used to be, what we are looking at is broken game for community, but a decorated greatness in pro scene.
